string.name: STR_DIC_LF3_gb_source_metal_40a
string.body: Orichalcum;A mineral found throughout Heiron. Ores of greatly differing quality are recovered in the extraction of the mineral.

string.name: STR_DIC_LF3_plant_n_c_40a
string.body: Linon Fiber;Fiber extracted from [%dic:STR_DIC_LF3_gb_source_plant_40b] plants. Linon is known to grow in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_D7], in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_D9], [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_D8], in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_F1], [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_F2], and [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_015].

string.name: STR_DIC_LF3_gb_source_plant_40b
string.body: Linon;A plant from which you can extract fiber. It grows in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_D7], in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_D9] and [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_D8], and in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_F1], [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_F2], and [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_015].

string.name: STR_DIC_LF3_herb_n_c_40a
string.body: Griffonia;A plant known to grow in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_F5], the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_F1], and the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_003].

string.name: STR_DIC_LF2a_gb_source_metal_20a_lf2a
string.body: Titanium;A metal found in Theobomos.

string.name: STR_DIC_LF2a_gb_source_noblemetal_20a_lf2a
string.body: Gold;A quality metal found in Theobomos. It commands a high price because of its rarity.

string.name: STR_DIC_LF2a_slate_n_q_20a
string.body: Upper Stone Plate;Can be found where [%dic:STR_DIC_LF2a_gb_source_metal_20a_lf2a] and [%dic:STR_DIC_LF2a_gb_source_noblemetal_20a_lf2a] are commonly mined.

string.name: STR_DIC_LF2a_gb_source_jewelry_20a_lf2a
string.body: Topaz;A gem found in certain regions of Theobomos. The gems are famed for their remarkable colors.

string.name: STR_DIC_LF2a_gb_source_jewelry_20b_lf2a
string.body: Aquamarine;A gem found in certain regions of Theobomos. It considered something of a rare gem, as fetches a healthy price at market.

string.name: STR_DIC_LF2a_gb_source_jewelry_20c_lf2a
string.body: Zircon Ore;An ore found in certain regions of Theobomos.

string.name: STR_DIC_LF2a_slate_n_q_20b
string.body: Middle Stone Plate;Can be found where [%dic:STR_DIC_LF2a_gb_source_jewelry_20a_lf2a] and [%dic:STR_DIC_LF2a_gb_source_jewelry_20b_lf2a] gems are found, and where [%dic:STR_DIC_LF2a_gb_source_jewelry_20c_lf2a] is mined.

string.name: STR_DIC_LF2a_gb_source_herb_20a_lf2a
string.body: Lumesia;A plant found in certain regions of Theobomos. It has a multitude of uses.

string.name: STR_DIC_LF2a_slate_n_q_20c
string.body: Lower Stone Plate;Can be found where [%dic:STR_DIC_LF2a_gb_source_herb_20a_lf2a] grows.

string.name: STR_DIC_LF2a_GB_SOURCE_TREE_40A_LF2B_B
string.body: Egrasi Log;Most commonly gathered in the Dirmoi Pass, the Empyrean Lords Sanctuary, and The Stalking Grounds in Theobomos. Egrasi trees are often found growing near larger trees, where they leeches nutrients from their roots.

string.name: STR_DIC_LF2a_GB_SOURCE_jr_part_dia_02a
string.body: Diamond Gem;A rare gem that fetches very high prices throughout Atreia.

string.name: STR_DIC_LF2a_GB_SOURCE_od_n_r_40a
string.body: Greater Aether;A rare substance that can be used imbue an item.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_air_collection_treasure01
string.body: Old Weathered Seal;A seal crafted by the Jotun. It can be obtained from animals, plants, or chests found in regions only accessible via windstream or geyser.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDCromede
string.body: Kromede's Trial;A dream world shown by Stigma infused with the thoughts of Kromede and Robstin. Elyos can enter it with the help of Daeva of Dream Reading [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Raninia], and Asmodians with the help of Daeva of Psychic Arts [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Bridget].

string.name: STR_DIC_M_18605
string.body: Dungeon Prisoners;Lost souls locked up in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDCromede_Prison].

string.name: STR_DIC_M_DF4_21241
string.body: Naduka Drakan Veterans;Refers to [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF4_C6_DrakanFi_vil_55_Ae]s, [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF4_C6_DrakanAs_vil_55_Ae]s, [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF4_C6_DrakanRa_vil_55_Ae]s, [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF4_C6_DrakanWi_vil_55_Ae]s, and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF4_C6_DrakanPr_vil_55_Ae]s who defend the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_SZ_DF4_C6].

string.name: STR_DIC_M_IDAbRe_Core_Boss_Guardian_Light_Fi_55_Al
string.body: Rukril;A huge magical creature protecting the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDAbRe_Core_SZ_All]. It is normally fused with [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDAbRe_Core_Boss_Guardian_Dark_Fi_55_Al], but separates from it when threatened.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_IDAbRe_Core_Boss_Guardian_Dark_Fi_55_Al
string.body: Ebonsoul;A huge magical creature protecting the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDAbRe_Core_SZ_All]. It is normally fused with [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDAbRe_Core_Boss_Guardian_Light_Fi_55_Al], but separates from it when threatened.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_IDAbRe_Core_Boss_Octaside_Kn_55_Al
string.body: Kaluva the Fourth Fragment;A gigantic Arachna in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDAbRe_Core_SZ_All] that has a fragment of the Tower of Aion embedded in its tail. It guards its eggs and traps anyone who approaches in a cocoon.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_IDAbRe_Core_Boss_TempestElemental_El_55_Al
string.body: Pazuzu;A beautiful spirit in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDAbRe_Core_SZ_All]. Aether seems to have changed its features significantly.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_IDAbRe_Core_Boss_ElementalkingE_Wi_55_Al
string.body: Yamennes;The guardian of the Artifact of Protection in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDAbRe_Core_SZ_All]. His obsession with the protection of this artifact has changed him, and any attempt at destroying the Huge Aether Fragment makes him furious. He may appear either as Yamennes Painflare or Yamennes Blindsight.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_IDAbRe_Core_FiNmd_Combine
string.body: Dayshade;A huge magical creature protecting the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDAbRe_Core_SZ_All]. It splits into [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDAbRe_Core_Boss_Guardian_Light_Fi_55_Al] and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDAbRe_Core_Boss_Guardian_Dark_Fi_55_Al] when threatened.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_IDAbRe_Core_Artifact
string.body: Artifact of Protection;The source of immense power that sustains the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDAbRe_Core_SZ_All]. It affects every living creature there. Destroying the Huge Aether Fragment destabilizes it.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_IDAbRe_Core_ArtifactCore
string.body: Huge Aether Fragment;A huge piece of Aether that appears when the powerful guardians of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDAbRe_Core_SZ_All] are defeated. It is thought to affect the Artifact of Protection.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_IDAbRe_Core_Seed
string.body: Orkanimum Fragment;A piece detached from the [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDAbRe_Core_SilikaCannon_Ra_55_Ah] in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDAbRe_Core_SZ_All]. It is said that life spawns from this fragment.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_IDElim_keynamed
string.body: Taloc's Tormentors;[%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDElim_1F_Sheluk_KeyNM_52_Ae], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDElim_1F_Clodworm_ItemNM_52_Ae], and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDElim_2F_Octaside_KeyNM_52_Ae], beings of great power dwelling inside Taloc.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_21277
string.body: Drakan Researcher;Drakan researchers in the Naduka Biolab. Refers to [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF4_W_C5_DrakanPr_Re_lab_55_An] and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF4_C4_DrakanPr_lab_54_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_M_IDStation_Hugen_NM_58An
string.body: Weapon H;A creature designed by the Balaur. Incomplete, it waits for its masters in the Aturam Sky Fortress Warehouse Zone.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_IDStation_ShulackFlight_NM_58_An
string.body: Popuchin;A Shulack of the Kaichin Engineering League. Since the Balaur subjugated his tribe, he has served in the Dredgion Fabrication Zone of the Aturam Sky Fortress.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_IDStation_DrakanNinja_NM_58_An
string.body: Ashunatal Shadowslip;Tiamat's trusted subordinate, guards the New Surkana in the Aturam Sky Fortress' Power Chamber.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_IDStation_DrakanBoss_58Re2
string.body: Commander Barus;At home in the Aturam Sky Fortress Command Center, the Commander appears when many Command Area Drakan are attacked.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_IDStation_Q18309
string.body: Dredgion Generator Protector;A craftsman who manages the Dredgion Generator in the Aturam Sky Fortress, including [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDStation_ShuLackFI_2_58n], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDStation_ShuLackKN_2_58n], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDStation_ShuLackRA_2_58n], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDStation_ShuLackWI_2_58n], and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDStation_ShuLackPR_2_58n].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_ME_PART_L_10_01A
string.body: Iron Clamp;One of the essential parts needed for construction. These clamps are made at the Construction Bench after collecting [%dic:STR_DIC_I_metal_n_c_81j].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_QUEST_SKILL_MENUI_299b
string.body: Undin's Plush Chair;Your first special furniture piece to craft to prove you're an expert. Buy the design from [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Lurine] and make Undin's Chair with a special, added element.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_QUEST_SKILL_MENUI_399B
string.body: Processed Fasimedes' Chair;The second furniture piece required to qualify as an expert. Buy the design from [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Lurine] and make Fasimedes' Chair, adding one more special item for processing.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_QUEST_SKILL_MENUI_500
string.body: Eremitia's Plush Chair;An exceptionally beautiful chair obtained by buying a design from [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Lurine] and making Eremitia's Chair with an added, special item.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_ShulackShip_L_2F
string.body: Steel Rake Cabin;The middle decks of the Steel Rake where Sea Song Tavern, Grogget's Safe, and Mercenary Quarters are found. It can be entered by speaking to [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LC1_Shulackship_solo].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_ShulackShip_D_2F
string.body: Steel Rake Cabin;The middle decks of the Steel Rake where Sea Song Tavern, Grogget's Safe, and Mercenary Quarters are found. It can be entered by speaking to [%dic:STR_DIC_N_DC1_Shulackship_solo].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_metal_n_c_housing_l
string.body: Adamantium Ore;A useful material found in Eltnen and Heiron. It can be gathered with an Essencetapping skill of at least 200p.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_fs_material_n_c_l
string.body: Minor Construction Flux;This flux can be collected from a Hearthbloom or during an event.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_fs_material_n_c_21a_l
string.body: Lesser Construction Flux;This flux can be collected from a Hearthbloom or during an event.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_metal_n_c_housing_d
string.body: Adamantium Ore;A useful material found in Morheim and Beluslan. It can be gathered with an Essencetapping skill of at least 200p.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_fs_material_n_c_d
string.body: Minor Construction Flux;This flux can be collected from a Hearthbloom or during an event.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_fs_material_n_c_21a_d
string.body: Lesser Construction Flux;This flux can be collected from a Hearthbloom or during an event.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_junk_town_upgrade_aventurine
string.body: Goldstone;A special ore that sometimes comes from Essencetapping the gatherable items in residential areas.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_junk_town_upgrade_rich_soil
string.body: Divine Fertile Soil;Occasionally comes from destroying the Audria that appears around Oriel.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_junk_town_upgrade_rich_soil_d
string.body: Divine Fertile Soil;Occasionally comes from destroying the Audria that appears around Pernon.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_junk_town_upgrade_seasonlight
string.body: Season's Light;Spring, Summer, Autumn, and Winter Agrints contain this seasonal energy.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_junk_town_upgrade_flower_soul
string.body: Flower's Essence;The flawless beauty of a flower, given tangible form. It can be collected from a Dye Plant, which appears when a village reaches level 4.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Town_shugo_Worker_05
string.body: Village Construction Boss;Every village in Oriel has someone responsible for managing buildings, to level up the village.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Town_D_shugo_Worker_05
string.body: Village Construction Boss;Every village in Pernon has someone responsible for managing buildings, to level up the village.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Town_Visitorpot_seller_05
string.body: Village Guestbloom Merchant;A merchant who will set up shop in a village that is at least level 2. The higher the village's level, the wider the selection of Guestblooms.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Town_D_Visitorpot_seller_05
string.body: Village Guestbloom Merchant;A merchant who will set up shop in a village that is at least level 2. The higher the village's level, the wider the selection of Guestblooms.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Town_SZtownA
string.body: Prosperity's Light Village Gardener;A Shugo who tends the garden in Prosperity's Light Village. The village is known as the wealthiest in Oriel.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Town_SZtownA1
string.body: Goldendell Village Gardener;A Shugo who tends the garden in Goldendell Village. The earth in the village is a rich golden color.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Town_SZtownA2
string.body: Glimmertree Village Gardener;A Shugo who tends the garden in Glimmertree Village. The fireflies in the trees at nightfall are a famous sight.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Town_SZtownA3
string.body: Vibrant Garden Village Gardener;A Shugo who tends the garden in Vibrant Garden Village. The village is known for its foliage, which shines purple under the Aether light.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Town_SZtownB
string.body: Sunset Coast Village Gardener;A Shugo who tends the garden in Sunset Coast Village. The sunset over the sea here is well worth seeing.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Town_SZtownB1
string.body: Thorn Tree Village Gardener;A Shugo who tends the garden in Thorn Tree Village. Visitors must watch out for the vicious thorn trees here.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Town_SZtownB2
string.body: Seapath Village Gardener;A Shugo who tends the garden in Seapath Village. The victory statues in the village are a popular tourist attraction.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Town_SZtownB3
string.body: Brilliant Isle Village Gardener;A Shugo who tends the garden in Brilliant Isle Village. Villagers love to walk along the beautiful trail of wildflowers.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Town_SZtownB4
string.body: Palmcrest Village Gardener;A Shugo who tends the garden in Palmcrest Village. The palm trees here are uniquely shaped.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Town_SZtownB5
string.body: Silverspire Village Gardener;A Shugo who tends the garden in Silverspire Village. The mountain is a beautiful backdrop for this lovely village.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Town_SZtownB6
string.body: Summerfield Village Gardener;A Shugo who tends the garden in Summerfield Village. The trail of flowers is something to behold.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Town_SZtownB7
string.body: Sandbank Village Gardener;A Shugo who tends the garden in Sandbank Village. Many shells can be found on the sand there.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Town_SZtownB8
string.body: Pearl Cove Village Gardener;A Shugo who tends the garden in Pearl Cove Village. The villagers take pride in the beautiful stone walls they build between their houses.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Town_SZtownC
string.body: Rockroof Village Gardener;A Shugo who tends the garden in Rockroof Village. A fresh green scent wafts gently from the lush trees.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Town_SZtownC1
string.body: Stonecrest Village Gardener;A Shugo who tends the garden in Stonecrest Village. The villagers like their privacy, and place long wooden fences between their houses.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Town_SZtownC2
string.body: Reedpond Village Gardener;A Shugo who tends the garden in Reedpond Village. The village is known for its rural and lyrical scenery.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Town_SZtownC3
string.body: Peaks Crown Village Gardener;A Shugo who tends the garden in Peaks Crown Village. The village is known for the forest trail lined with lush foliage behind the village.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Town_SZtownC4
string.body: Elroco Hill Village Gardener;A Shugo who tends the garden in Elroco Hill Village. Geysers provide a natural source of warm water to the village.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Town_SZtownC5
string.body: Hillclimb Village Gardener;A Shugo who tends the garden in Hillclimb Village. The hill gives the village a vantage point for a striking view.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Town_SZtownC6
string.body: Betua Glen Village Gardener;A Shugo who tends the garden in Betua Glen Village. The village lights up after nightfall.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Town_SZtownC7
string.body: Millennium Tree Village Gardener;A Shugo who tends the garden in Millennium Tree Village. The tree in this village is said to be a thousand years old.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Town_SZtownC8
string.body: Riverwell Village Gardener;A Shugo who tends the garden in Riverwell Village. The well water tastes so crisp and clear there used to be a rumor that it had special properties.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Town_SZtownC9
string.body: Misty Vista Village Gardener;A Shugo who tends the garden in Misty Vista Village. The fog rolls in each morning, obscuring what would otherwise be a spectacular view.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Town_SZtownC10
string.body: Hotsprings Village Gardener;A Shugo who tends the garden in Hotsprings Village. It is said that taking a bath in the spring here can cure any ailment.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Town_SZtownC11
string.body: Mill Ridge Village Gardener;A Shugo who tends the garden in Mill Ridge Village. The windmills of the village are a landmark.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Town_d_SZTown_d_A
string.body: Glorious Light Village Gardener;A Shugo who tends the garden in Glorious Light Village. The village is known to be the wealthiest village in Pernon.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Town_d_SZTown_d_A1
string.body: Sunny Harbor Village Gardener;A Shugo who tends the garden in Sunny Harbor Village. The harbor is bright and busy, making it a popular attraction.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Town_d_SZTown_d_A2
string.body: Silver Tree Village Gardener;A Shugo who tends the garden in Silver Tree Village. The trees surrounding the village are delicate and silver.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Town_d_SZTown_d_A3
string.body: Golden Sunset Village Gardener;A Shugo who tends the garden in Golden Sunset Village. The sunset here is the most spectacular in Pernon.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Town_d_SZTown_d_B
string.body: Spire Isle Village Gardener;A Shugo who tends the garden in Spire Isle Village. The blue lotus flowers here bloom very rarely, making it a special occasion when they do.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Town_d_SZTown_d_B1
string.body: Morning Mist Village Gardener;A Shugo who tends the garden in Morning Mist Village. The village is known for its morning mist.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Town_d_SZTown_d_B2
string.body: Spring Hill Village Gardener;A Shugo who tends the garden in Spring Hill Village. The light here gives the village a bright, spring-like feeling all year round.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Town_d_SZTown_d_B3
string.body: Coast Road Village Gardener;A Shugo who tends the garden in Coast Road Village. The village is known for its forest trail along the coast.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Town_d_SZTown_d_B4
string.body: Azure Inlet Village Gardener;A Shugo who tends the garden in Azure Inlet Village. A cool, refreshing breeze blows in from the mountain to this village.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Town_d_SZTown_d_B5
string.body: Greenleaf Village Gardener;A Shugo who tends the garden in Greenleaf Village. The village is known for its red foliage all year round.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Town_d_SZTown_d_B6
string.body: Mistcloak Village Gardener;A Shugo who tends the garden in Mistcloak Village. The light mist gives everything a fantastical bluish haze.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Town_d_SZTown_d_B7
string.body: Longhill Pass Village Gardener;A Shugo who tends the garden in Longhill Pass Village. The village is known for its many rolling hills.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Town_d_SZTown_d_B8
string.body: Spindletree Village Gardener;A Shugo who tends the garden in Spindletree Village. The village is known for its evergreen trees.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Town_d_SZTown_d_C
string.body: Zephyr Village Gardener;A Shugo who tends the garden in Zephyr Village. The village is known for its pleasant breeze.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Town_d_SZTown_d_C1
string.body: Verdant Ridge Village Gardener;A Shugo who tends the garden in Verdant Ridge Village. This low-lying village is surrounded by green, all the way to the horizon.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Town_d_SZTown_d_C2
string.body: Spruce Ridge Village Gardener;A Shugo who tends the garden in Spruce Ridge Village. The villagers grow wildflowers for a contest each year.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Town_d_SZTown_d_C3
string.body: Aironroost Village Gardener;A Shugo who tends the garden in Aironroost Village. Many migratory birds find a nest here.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Town_d_SZTown_d_C4
string.body: Stonewall Village Gardener;A Shugo who tends the garden in Stonewall Village. There are many scenic walks between the long stone walls here.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Town_d_SZTown_d_C5
string.body: Brightleaf Village Gardener;A Shugo who tends the garden in Brightleaf Village. The village is a shining jewel among rocky hills.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Town_d_SZTown_d_C6
string.body: Hallowed Falls Village Gardener;A Shugo who tends the garden in Hallowed Falls Village. The flowers here attract rare butterflies.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Town_d_SZTown_d_C7
string.body: Foothill Basin Village Gardener;A Shugo who tends the garden in Foothill Basin Village. The surrounding mountains form an impressive backdrop to the village.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Town_d_SZTown_d_C8
string.body: Bloomroad Village Gardener;A Shugo who tends the garden in Bloomroad Village. The village is noted for a road covered in bountiful flowers.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Town_d_SZTown_d_C9
string.body: Shepherd's Peak Village Gardener;A Shugo who tends the garden in Shepherd's Peak Village. Each time it snows, this village is brightened by snow flowers.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Town_d_SZTown_d_C10
string.body: Seven Peaks Village Gardener;A Shugo who tends the garden in Seven Peaks Village. The village has a park where all the villagers meet for fun and relaxation.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Town_d_SZTown_d_C11
string.body: Alpindell Village Gardener;A Shugo who tends the garden in Alpindell Village. Many rocky mountains surrounds the village.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_DF1a_Q2013all
string.body: Proof of Hunting;Either hairpins from MuMu Patrols, Veteran MuMu Patrols, Black Claw Patrols, and Feral Black Claw Patrols, or tough belts from MuMu Gatherers, Veteran MuMu Gatherers, and MuMu Farmers.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_DF1a_Q2012all
string.body: The Lepharist Revolutionaries;The [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LehparAsD_9_An]s and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LehparWaD_10_An]s that have been spotted near the fortress.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_region_17003
string.body: Judge Kromede;Either [%dic:STR_DIC_M_FireSanctuaryQueenBoss_37_Ae] or [%dic:STR_DIC_M_SanctuaryQueen_con_37_Ae].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_abyssdown_in
string.body: Base of the Abyss;Entrances to this layer of the Abyss exist in the sky above Verteron Citadel, underneath Eltnen Fortress, and at New Heiron Gate.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_abyssdown_in_d
string.body: Base of the Abyss;Entrances to this layer of the Abyss exist in the sky above Altgard Fortress, Morheim Fortress, and Beluslan Fortress.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_abyssup_in
string.body: Top of the Abyss;You can teleport to this layer of the Abyss directly from Teminon Landing if your faction owns any fortresses there. Otherwise, go to the Western or Eastern Shard of Latesran to find a teleporter.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_abyssup_in_d
string.body: Top of the Abyss;You can teleport to this layer of the Abyss directly from Primum Landing if your faction owns any fortresses there. Otherwise, go to the Western or Eastern Shard of Latesran to find a teleporter.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_abyssdeep_in
string.body: Core of the Abyss;To reach the Core, go to the Top layer of the Abyss and fly down.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_abyssdeep_in_d
string.body: Core of the Abyss;To reach the Core, go to the Top layer of the Abyss and fly down.

string.name: DC1_Monster_Helion_Q2900
string.body: Hellion;The Elyos of destiny and your nemesis according to Skuld's visions. He is the one who will change the course of Elysea's destiny, but yet nothing is truly known about him.

string.name: STR_DIC_Xmasevent_001
string.body: Solorius;A grand festival first initiated by Solorius, the Daeva of Marriage. The Solorius festival occured during the Festival of the Twelve, and was meant to help people find love.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_D_holyskill_all
string.body: Divine Power Skills;Refers to the following skills: [%dic:STR_DIC_E_D_FI], [%dic:STR_DIC_E_D_KN], [%dic:STR_DIC_E_D_RA], [%dic:STR_DIC_E_D_AS], [%dic:STR_DIC_E_D_WI], [%dic:STR_DIC_E_D_EL], [%dic:STR_DIC_E_D_PR], and [%dic:STR_DIC_E_D_CH].

string.body: Zikel's Shield;A powerful Templar skill that uses DP.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_D_master
string.body: Class Preceptors;Preceptors for each class found at the Capitol Building in Pandaemonium. The preceptors are [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Traufnir], [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Sigyn], [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Sif], [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Freyr], [%dic:STR_DIC_N_DC1_Hadubrand_M], and [%dic:STR_DIC_N_DC1_Brinhild_M].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_L_master
string.body: Class Preceptors;Preceptors for each class found at the Protectors Hall in Sanctum. The preceptors are [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Boreas], [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Juventus], [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Hecate], [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Thrasymedes], [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LC1_Anyte_M], and [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LC1_Dion_M].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDAb1_MiniCastle
string.body: Nochsana Training Camp;A training camp built by the Balaur in the Abyss. You can access it through the [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_AB1_Corridor_Q4702].

string.name: STR_DIC_Notes_001
string.body: Operation Policy;Refers to the rules that the company has implemented to respond with consistency to any problems that may occur while the company operates Aion. It is also a promise between the company and its customers to create a more stable and efficient game environment.

string.name: STR_DIC_Notes_002
string.body: Fraudulent Item;It is impossible to restore the items that you have obtained for free or in any inappropriate way through actions that violate the [%dic:STR_DIC_Notes_001].

string.name: STR_DIC_Notes_003
string.body: Chatting Restriction;If you repeatedly spam, curse or swear on the chat window, you may be warned or be forbidden to chat according to the [%dic:STR_DIC_Notes_001].

string.name: STR_DIC_Notes_004
string.body: In-game Support;You can ask the [%dic:STR_DIC_Notes_013]s for help when you face a serious trouble during game play and cannot handle it on your own. You can submit a petition from 13:00 pm to 05:00 am of the next day.

string.name: STR_DIC_Notes_005
string.body: Homepage Support;For more information about services, game play or troubleshooting, please submit your petition to the Customer Support Center on the [%dic:STR_DIC_Notes_011]. You can use this service when you need to attach a screenshot or when you have a relevant question.

string.name: STR_DIC_Notes_006
string.body: Game Guide;The encyclopedia of Aion. The company regularly updates and summarizes ever-changing Aion information for customers.

string.name: STR_DIC_Notes_007
string.body: AionOnline.com;For the latest Aion news, visit AionOnline.com.

string.name: STR_DIC_Notes_008
string.body: FAQ;Frequently asked questions regarding Aion.

string.name: STR_DIC_Notes_009
string.body: Account Theft;Please write to the [%dic:STR_DIC_Notes_010] immediately if anyone has misused your account.

string.name: STR_DIC_Notes_010
string.body: Account Theft Report Center;You can report any instance of [%dic:STR_DIC_Notes_009] to the Customer Report Center on the [%dic:STR_DIC_Notes_011].

string.name: STR_DIC_Notes_011
string.body: Official Homepage;You can find all the games that NCSOFT provides. The homepage address is http://www.aiononline.com/

string.name: STR_DIC_Notes_012
string.body: Official Base;A club community service, which divides into the game base and the social base.

string.name: STR_DIC_Notes_013
string.body: GM;GMs or Game Masters will be always ready to assist customers. They will take care of all troubles you may encounter during the gameplay as soon as possible.

string.name: STR_DIC_Notes_014
string.body: Cargo/Award System;The In-game Cargo System delivers gifts and messages to celebrate certain occasions and to award the best reporters and event winners.

string.name: STR_DIC_Notes_015
string.body: CM;The CM or Community Manager talks with customers on the free bulletin board of the homepage and implements changes into the game.

string.name: STR_DIC_Notes_016
string.body: Tazz;Aion bulletin board manager ([%dic:STR_DIC_Notes_015]), who first started to work online on January 29, 2007. He may be the closest person to the customers. Tazz writes his field experience report every week and serves as a bridge between the Aion Team and its customers.

string.name: STR_DIC_Notes_017
string.body: Personal Authentication;A process to authenticate your identity through your cellular phone or public authentication.

string.name: STR_DIC_Notes_018
string.body: Public authentication;A certificate that you can obtain from a financial institute if you pay a certain fee and follow the specified procedure.

string.name: STR_DIC_Notes_019
string.body: Fee System;

string.name: STR_DIC_Notes_020
string.body: Game Agreement;A process by which you agree to the Service Terms before you start playing the game. You cannot play the game if you do not agree to the terms.

string.name: STR_DIC_Notes_021
string.body: Register Coupon;

string.name: STR_DIC_Notes_022
string.body: Additional Service;Services that you can use after the [%dic:STR_DIC_Notes_017] process, including gender change and server transfer.

string.name: STR_DIC_Notes_023
string.body: Toll;A means of payment equivalent to cash on the Internet. You can use it to buy paid items or paid services of the game services that the company currently operates.

string.name: STR_DIC_Notes_024
string.body: Unacceptable User;A user who has violated the [%dic:STR_DIC_Notes_001] in or out of the game by engaging in [%dic:STR_DIC_Notes_025] or committing [%dic:STR_DIC_Notes_026]. If you are classified as an acceptable user, you may be subjected to restricted access to your character and account.

string.name: STR_DIC_Notes_025
string.body: Verbal Abuse;Inappropriate speech that may offend others in or out of the game. If you are abusive, you may be subjected to restricted access to your character and account according to the [%dic:STR_DIC_Notes_001].

string.name: STR_DIC_Notes_026
string.body: Fraud;Any behavior that aims at deceiving other customers for personal gain. If you engage in fraud, you may be subjected to restricted access to your account according to the [%dic:STR_DIC_Notes_001].

string.name: STR_DIC_Notes_027
string.body: Illegal Programs;All illegal software/hardware that can affect the gameplay and all programs not authorized by the company.

string.name: STR_DIC_Notes_028
string.body: Bot Program;All external software and hardware that automatically repeats a specific action infinitely even when additional operation is not made.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_IDF4Re_Drana_Li_NPC
string.body: Sanctum Expedition Inspector;[%dic:STR_DIC_N_idioma] or [%dic:STR_DIC_N_odde]. These Daevas were dispatched to investigate Balaur Prisoners' disappearances in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF4_SZ_2011_A] and the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF4_SZ_2021_A].

string.name: STR_DIC_M_Q18401
string.body: Esoterrace Researcher;Drakan Researchers at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_idf4re_drana_SZ_Stage_03_2]. These include Esoterrace Investigators, Esoterrace Researchers, Esoterrace Recordkeepers, Esoterrace Anesthetist, and Esoterrace Assistants.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDf4re_Drana_Li
string.body: Esoterrace;The largest Drana producer in Tiamaranta. Passageways from the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF4_SZ_2011_A] and the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF4_SZ_2021_A] connect to the Esoterrace.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_18403
string.body: Esoterrace Elite;Drakan Soldiers guarding the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_idf4re_drana_SZ_Stage_02_1]. These include Esoterrace Destroyers, Esoterrace Raiders, Esoterrace Hunters, Esoterrace Mages, and Esoterrace Apothecaries.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_Q18411
string.body: Esoterrace Laborers;Esoterrace Workers and Esoterrace Gatherers working in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_idf4re_drana_SZ_Stage_01_2].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_IDF4Re_Drana_Da_NPC
string.body: Pandaemonium Expedition Inspector;An inspector dispatched to the Balaur Fortress in Vorgaltem in order to research the disappearance of Balaur Prisoners. So far, only [%dic:STR_DIC_N_hedele] and [%dic:STR_DIC_N_ovirin] have arrived.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDf4re_Drana_Da
string.body: Esoterrace;The largest Drana producer in Tiamaranta. Passageways from the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF4_SZ_3011_A] and the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF4_SZ_3021_A] connect to the Esoterrace.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_IDF4Re_Drana_FOBJ_Q18402
string.body: Blighted Dalia Root;These [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDF4Re_Dra_01_BionicCPU_53_Ah] roots absorb energy from Elim in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_idf4re_drana_SZ_Stage_01_2].

string.name: STR_DIC_M_Q11293
string.body: Padmarashka's Protectors;[%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF4_Dramata_57_Al]'s Elite Drakan guard unit. They include Naduka Drakan Elite Combat Captains, Naduka Cryptomancers, Naduka Tribunus, and Naduka Greatpriests.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDArena_pvp_L
string.body: Crucible Coliseum;A great arena in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_Arena_L_Lobby]. The Arenas of Discipline, Chaos, and Cooperation are open for combat, but you will need a ticket from [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Eno] to enter. Competing in those arenas will reward you with a ticket to enter the Arena of Glory.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDArena_pvp_D
string.body: Crucible Coliseum;A great arena in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_Arena_D_Lobby]. The Arenas of Discipline, Chaos, and Cooperation are open for combat, but you will need a ticket from [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Reigar] to enter. Competing in those arenas will reward you with a ticket to enter the Arena of Glory.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDArena_L
string.body: Kaisinel Academy;Win [%dic:STR_DIC_I_COIN_ARENA_01] in the Empyrean Crucible and Crucible Challenge, and [%dic:STR_DIC_I_COIN_ARENA_PVP_01] in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDArena_pvp_L].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDArena_D
string.body: Marchutan Priory;Win [%dic:STR_DIC_I_COIN_ARENA_01] in the Empyrean Crucible and Crucible Challenge, and [%dic:STR_DIC_I_COIN_ARENA_PVP_01] in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDArena_pvp_D].

string.name: STR_DIC_M_Q21292
string.body: Padmarashka Guard;Sentries guarding the entrance to Padmarashka's Nest. They include Padmarashka's Elite Sentinels and Padmarashka's Elite Administrators.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF4B_ItemUseArea_Q10060A
string.body: Magic Ward;A magic ward installed around [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_T1_S8] by the Reian Tribe.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4b_T4_Tiamat_Crystal_Named_60_Af
string.body: Petrification Incarnate;An Incarnation of Tiamat who protects the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_T4_S6].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF4B_Occupation_Combat
string.body: Siege Warfare;A battle to occupy the four Hearts of Tiamat. At certain times, Tiamat's Incarnations occupy the Hearts. If you defeat the Incarnation, the Heart is yours.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF4B_ItemUseArea_Q20062A
string.body: Magic Ward;A magic ward installed around [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_T3_S7] by the Reian Tribe,

string.body: Raksha;A dragon sealed in Raksang. Depending on the road you choose, you'll meet either [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDRaksha_05_Raksha_Nmd_60_Ae] or [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDRaksha_5F_Raksha_Nmd_57_Ae].

string.name: STR_DIC_M_Q11506_all_1
string.body: Shulacks;[%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A2_ShulackRa_57_An] and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A2_ShulackFi_57_An] who occupied the Menin Village.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_ldf4a_Owllau_fam
string.body: Urugugu Tribe;A Strigik tribe who settled in the southwest of Sarpan. Due to their history of hard times under Tiamat, they keep to a tough military training system.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_ldf4a_Aurio
string.body: Aurio;A respected and good-looking Strigik, whose star-crossed love is most firmly disapproved by his father.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Q11509all
string.body: Strigik Soldiers;[%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A3_Owllau_Fi_57_An], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A3_Owllau_As_57_An], and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A3_Owllau_Pr_57_An] who live in Urugugu Village.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF4a_KarunProtect
string.body: Kahrun Guard;A defensive legion in Kamar whose loyalty to Kahrun is unwavering.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF4a_Q10050all
string.body: Escaped Dragonbound;[%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_OP_FanaticFi_Q_56_An] and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_OP_FanaticWi_Q_56_An] who escaped to the Mephitic Caverns.

string.name: STR_DIC_QUEST_18303A
string.body: Char Bombom;An explosive device made from the H Core. Its immense power will surely destroy the New Surkana.

string.name: STR_DIC_QUEST_18306All
string.body: Disorganized Kaichin Leaguers;The [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDStation_01_GolemFi_Worker_58_n]s, [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDStation_01_GolemKn_Worker_58_n]s, [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDStation_01_GolemFi_Test_58_n]s, [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDStation_01_ShulackFi_58_An]s, and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDStation_01_ShulackPr_58_An]s, who remain in the fortress even in the wake of your destruction.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_QUEST_18308All_1
string.body: Remnants in the Fabrication Zone;[%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDStation_02_ShulackKn_58_An], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDStation_02_ShulackAs_58_An], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDStation_02_ShulackWi_58_An], and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDStation_IronGolem_58_An] who remain in the Dredgion Fabrication Zone of the Aturam Sky Fortress.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_QUEST_18309all_1
string.body: Engineering League Craftsmen;[%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDStation_ShuLackFI_2_58n]s, [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDStation_ShuLackKN_2_58n]s, [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDStation_ShuLackRA_2_58n]s, [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDStation_ShuLackWI_2_58n]s, and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDStation_ShuLackPR_2_58n]s who manage the power generators.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_IDStation_recharger
string.body: Recharger;Equipment installed in the Supply Zone of Aturam Sky Fortress. Its original purpose was to charge weapons, but it can also provide energy to living creatures.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Housing_Townhouse
string.body: Studio;The studio located in the Rockroof Village in Arcada State. You can enter through either the Studio Entrance or the Homeward Bound skill.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Housing_Butler
string.body: Butler;Responsible for administrative affairs for all houses. Your butler always stays at home, takes care of house chores, and grants you a gift once per day.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Housing_FurnitureArrangement
string.body: Decorate;When you enter your house, you can click the house-shaped button in the lower half of the screen. In Decorate mode, you can change the location of furniture and other items.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Housing_CrystalOfRelationship
string.body: Relationship Crystal;An installation seen in every house. If you use the crystal, you can teleport to your friend's registered house.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Housing_Pot
string.body: Bloom;A plant that grows its own blessings. If it's well taken care of, it may give you a gift.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_HouseGate
string.body: Homeward Bound;A skill obtained through a skillbook earned when you buy a studio. If you use it, a corridor to your home will open.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Housing_Furniture
string.body: Furniture;The most important element for home decoration. Furniture merchants sell it in the center of every village, and far more styles are available through crafting.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Q11511item
string.body: Sleeping Drug;A sleeping pill that Owllaet asked you to bring. Tell [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Mooluios] first, because Owllaet's request is somewhat suspicious.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Q11512_box
string.body: Fancy Box;An ornate box with no obvious value.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Q11512_box_1
string.body: Fancy Box;An accessories box beside [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Owlau_LDF4a_01].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF4a_Sadonix
string.body: Sadonics;A giant Asmodian ship led by Captain Luespaner. The ship is equipped with powerful Aether cannons.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF4a_Q20050all
string.body: Mephitic Klaw;[%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_OP_Neut_Worker_55_An], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_OP_Neut_Fly_55_An], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_OP_Neut_WorkerHigh_55_An], and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_OP_Neut_FlyHigh_56_An] burrowing beneath Kamar.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF4a_20051all
string.body: Shulack Search Squad;[%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A2_ShulackFi_57_An] and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A2_ShulackRa_57_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF4a_21509all
string.body: Humnaz Altar;[%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A4_02], [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A4_06], and [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A4_07] that are used by the Humnaz Tribe for rituals.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_sarpan_main
string.body: Sarpan;The Reian Tribe's ancestral land, reclaimed by the Reians from Tiamat's rule after the Cataclysm.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF4a_calydon_fam
string.body: Humnaz Tribe;A Calydon Tribe who settled and flourished in the east of Sarpan.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Q21517_ebi
string.body: Hard Evidence;Proof that Calydon attacked refugees. You find the caravan door near Humnaz lands.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Q41157all
string.body: Three Refugees;Three missing refugees including [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF4a_Refugee_01], [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF4a_Refugee_02], and [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF4a_Refugee_03].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Q41177_yohar
string.body: Map Expert;Yohar, who used to be a pirate, may know something about the map.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Q41178all
string.body: Urugugu Soldier;Low-ranking soldiers in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A3_03], including [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A3_Owllau_Fi_57_An], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A3_Owllau_As_57_An], and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A3_Owllau_Pr_57_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Q41183all
string.body: Whistlin' Piggies Humnaz Jug Band;A band of elite Humnaz Tribe Soldiers including [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A4_CalydonPr_57_Ae], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A4_CalydonRa_57_Ae], and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A4_CalydonWi_57_Ae].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF4a_aponosFam
string.body: Aponos Tribe;The Brohum Tribe who settled in the west of Sarpan. Their origin and history are unknown.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Q41210_1
string.body: Glowing Spirits;[%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_B1_ElementalLightM_57_An] and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_B1_ElementalLightF_57_An] wandering the Trepone Forest.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_kipros_sheep
string.body: Kypros;A giant ship owned by the Reian Tribe. It has enormous firepower.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_spearofCiel
string.body: Siel's Spear;A legion that has a long history and follows the will of the Empyrean Lords. It consists of the Reian Tribe who are left outside the barrier due to the Cataclysm. Thanks to the legion, the Reian Tribe could successfully settle in the desolation of Balaurea.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Q41265all_0

string.body: Zorshiv Dredgion;The Dredgion of the Zorshiv Legion that emerges in random places in the skies of Sarpan. It is smaller than an ordinary Dredgion, but has an improved infiltration skill.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_DF_ChristmasEvent_Santa

string.name: STR_DIC_E_HousingDF_Event_SantaShugo
string.body: Shugo Delivery Supervisor;Assistant to the Festival Staff stationed behind [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Harretion] in Pernon. He's dealing with his frustrations over his Lazy Shugo Couriers.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Kebisung_lf
string.body: Thauminerk;Assistant to Lenatinerk in Sanctum. He exchanges Solorius Coins for various festival items.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Kebisung_df
string.body: Thauminerk;Assistant to Lenatinerk in Pandaemonium. He exchanges Solorius Coins for various festival items.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_ZONE_NAME_IDTiamat_Reward
string.body: Satra Treasure Hoard;The Satra Legion's secret storeroom in Tiamaranta's Eye. Enter it via the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_IDTiamat_Reward_DungeonTeleport_In_L] or the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_IDTiamat_Reward_DungeonTeleport_In_Down_L].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_IDTiamat_Reward_DungeonTeleport_In_L
string.body: Unstable Passage;A portal that appears when one of the Hearts in Tiamaranta is occupied. It connects with the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_ZONE_NAME_IDTiamat_Reward].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_IDTiamat_Reward_DungeonTeleport_In_Down_L
string.body: Treasury Infiltration Passage;A portal leading to the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_ZONE_NAME_IDTiamat_Reward]. It forms inside Tiamaranta's Eye when two or more Hearts are occupied.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Q12006
string.body: Areas beyond Kahrun's Will;The Naduka Legion Garrison, the Basrasa Legion Garrison, the Satra Legion Garrison, the Stronghold Underground, the Gurriki Grotto,the Gurriki Swamp, Lapialus Mineral Lake, Enos Forest, Blue Quartz Valley, and the Lapialus Mineral Veins. Kahrun's power does not stretch where Tiamat's is strongest.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_60lvDeva_wepon

string.name: STR_DIC_E_D_LF2a_entrance
string.body: Theobomos Lab;A secret research center located in Theobomos, Elysea. Asmodians can only enter via a [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_Entrance_D_Teo] in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2B_SZ_A_Town].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_L_DF2a_entrance
string.body: Adma Stronghold;A mystical castle located in Brusthonin, Asmodae. Elyoses can only enter through a [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_Entrance_L_Adma] in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2B_SZ_A_Town].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_D_LF2a_Q4117

string.name: STR_DIC_E_D_LF2a_Q4119
string.body: Naughty Pocaching;A monster wandering about the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_D_LF2a_entrance]. It will not allow anyone to investigate the lab.

string.body: Bard Guionbark;A criminal with a bounty on his head. [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Rovilance] reported a sighting of him in [%dic:STR_DIC_E_L_DF2a_entrance].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Apsu
string.body: Apsu;One of the original five Dragon Lords, assassinated by Tiamat, who ascended later.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_IDTiamat_solo_entrance_L
string.body: Portal to the Throne of Blood;A magical passage in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_Tiamat_down_start_L], which was created by Reian wizards. It leads to the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDTiamat_SZ_T6].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_IDTiamat_solo_entrance_D

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Q10073a

The most infuriating are [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4b_T1_Skeleton_Named_58_An], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4b_T2_Yun_Named_59_An], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4b_T3_Fanatic_Named_59_An], and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4b_T4_Yun_Ghost_Named_60_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Combine_Rookie
string.body: Fast-Track Server;An integrated server that allows players to play with people from different servers, and provides extra XP for activities. Click the icon in the lower right-hand corner to move to this server.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDAbRe_Core_02_SZ_All
string.body: Unstable Abyssal Splinter;It was generated by the unstable flow of Aether in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDAbRe_Core_SZ_All], a small abyss which can be reached via the Divine Fortress.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_IDAbRe_Core_02_Boss_Guardian_Light_Fi_60_Al
string.body: Unstable Rukril;This magical creature was originally in the body of the [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDAbRe_Core_02_Boss_Guardian_Dark_Fi_60_Al]. Aether has made it even more powerful.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_IDAbRe_Core_02_Boss_Guardian_Dark_Fi_60_Al
string.body: Unstable Ebonsoul;This magical creature was originally in the body of the [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDAbRe_Core_02_Boss_Guardian_Light_Fi_60_Al]. Aether has made it even more powerful.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_IDAbRe_Core_02_Boss_Octaside_Kn_60_Al
string.body: Unstable Kaluva the Fourth;A huge Arachna in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDAbRe_Core_02_SZ_All]. It will wrap anyone who threatens its eggs in a cocoon.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_IDAbRe_Core_02_Boss_TempestElemental_El_60_Al
string.body: Unstable Pazuzu;It was a beautiful spirit in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDAbRe_Core_02_SZ_All] but the effect of Aether has made it go berserk.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_IDAbRe_Core_02_Boss_ElementalkingE_Wi_60_Al
string.body: Strengthened Yamennes Blindsight;Protects the Artifact of Protection in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDAbRe_Core_02_SZ_All]. It is distorted beyond all recognition.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_IDAbRe_Core_02_FiNmd_Combine
string.body: Unstable Dayshade;A huge magical creature protecting the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDAbRe_Core_02_SZ_All]. It divides into [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDAbRe_Core_02_Boss_Guardian_Light_Fi_60_Al] and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDAbRe_Core_02_Boss_Guardian_Dark_Fi_60_Al] when it detects a threat.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_IDAbRe_Core_02_ArtifactCore
string.body: Huge Aether Fragment;A giant piece of Aether that appears when the protectors guarding the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDAbRe_Core_02_SZ_All] are defeated.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_IDAbRe_Core_02_Seed
string.body: Unstable Holy Orkanimum Fragment;A detached piece of [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDAbRe_Core_02_SilikaCannon_Ra_60_Ah] in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDAbRe_Core_02_SZ_All]. It is said that this fragment can spawn life of its own.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Q18030_3

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Silverlin
string.body: Silverine Ltd.;A Goldrine Ltd. affiliate undertaking several development projects with the goal of bringing prosperity to Katalam. Elyos interested in joining should meet with [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF5a_Lop_Silverlin_Join], while Asmodians should meet with [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF5a_Dop_Silverlin_Join].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5A_Pepe_E_01
string.body: North Tribunus Pippus;A Tribunus with the Guardian Detachment's Beritra's Bane Legion. He is constantly busy performing Pantager' tasks, and he has subordinates across Katalam. Find him at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5A_OP_L] in Katalam.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5A_Phone_E_01
string.body: North Fawn Guerilla Captain;The Captain of the Redfang Squad, a specialized branch of the Archon Battlegroup. His small band can be found throughout Katalam. Find him in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5A_OP_D] in Katalam.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF5_Under_all
string.body: Idian Depths;A facility that the Danuar built under Katalam. It was left unattended after the demise of the Danuar. Currently, the area is occupied by the Guardian Detachment, Archon Battlegroup, Beritra Legion, Tiamat Remnants, and Shugos.

string.body: Lunatic Skeleton;A zombie that can be summoned from [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5_Under_CoffinB_65_n]. Its eyes are filled with madness.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_BLDF5_CoffinA_Sum_65_An

string.name: STR_DIC_N_IDLDF5_Under_01_Theano_E_nouse
string.body: Theana;An Elyos agent who has infiltrated the Beritran base at Ophidan Bridge. She is a Daeva of Zephyr.

string.body: Rohellein;An Asmodian agent who has infiltrated the Beritran base at Ophidan Bridge. She is an Archon of Dusk.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_IDF5_U1_VriFlagall
string.body: Balaur Power Generators;A set of generators powered by Surkana used to maintain the posts installed around the Ophidan Bridge. They include the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_IDF5_U1_VriFlag01_65_e], [%dic:STR_DIC_E_IDF5_U1_VriFlag02_65_e], [%dic:STR_DIC_E_IDF5_U1_VriFlag03_65_e], and [%dic:STR_DIC_E_IDF5_U1_VriFlag04_65_e].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_IDF5_U1_VriFlag01_65_e_nouse
string.body: Chokepoint Generator;A Balaur power generator installed in the Chokepoint Defense Post near the Ophidan Bridge. The generator must be powered off to occupy the guard post and engage the bridge switch.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_IDF5_U1_VriFlag02_65_e_nouse
string.body: Northern Generator;A Balaur power generator installed in the Norther Approach Post near the Ophidan Bridge. The generator must be powered off to occupy the guard post and engage the bridge switch.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_IDF5_U1_VriFlag03_65_e_nouse

string.name: STR_DIC_E_IDF5_U1_VriFlag04_65_e_nouse
string.body: Bridgewatch Generator;A Balaur power generator installed at Bridgewatch Post on the western abutment of Ophidan Bridge. The generator must be powered off to occupy the guard post and engage the bridge switch.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_quest_13528all
string.body: Research Reports;The Beritra Army Intelligence Unit in Idian Depths has been searching for relics and information on Idgel. They have produced three reports including the [%dic:STR_DIC_I_quest_13528a], [%dic:STR_DIC_I_quest_13528b], and [%dic:STR_DIC_I_quest_13528c].

string.body: The 2nd Unit Dredgion Commanders;The commanders of the Beritra Airborne Unit attempting to take over Sillus Fortress. They are ruthless leaders who will destroy any Asmodian or Elyos defenders they find.

string.body: The 3rd Unit Dredgion Commanders;The commanders of the Beritra Airborne Unit which has laid siege to Silona Fortress. They are expert at infiltration, show no mercy and give no quarter. They should be exterminated with great prejudice.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_quest_23528all
string.body: Expedition Reports;The Sheban Intelligence Unit in Idian Depths was sent to investigate relics and hunt for information on Idgel. They are known to have produced at least three reports on their progress, they are [%dic:STR_DIC_I_quest_23528a], [%dic:STR_DIC_I_quest_23528b], and [%dic:STR_DIC_I_quest_23528c].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDLDF5_Under_01
string.body: Ophidan Bridge;A bridge on the border of Danaria and Katalam that is also the location of a Bertiran Army base that houses the army's siege weapons. It can be reached from the Idian Depths.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF5_Under_Rune_FrostNmd_2_N_Ma_65_Ah
string.body: Cursed Queen Modor;Modor Arrownail, the ancient Danuar Necromancer. Records claim that she was stricken with sadness after losing her son, and sought the power of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDLDF5_Under_Rune] to draw enough power to resurrect him. It is claimed that she resides there still.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_DP_RI
string.body: Power Flux I;An Aethertech skill that requires the consumption of DP.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Q12412
string.body: Cipher-Blade Strengthening Materials;Materials needed to strengthen Adella's Cipher-Blade. You need [%dic:STR_DIC_I_ldf4b_weapon_upgrade_01], [%dic:STR_DIC_I_ldf4b_weapon_upgrade_02], and [%dic:STR_DIC_I_ldf4b_weapon_upgrade_03] along with an Adella's Cipher-Blade.

Some parts of the generators have been damaged and now they have to be recharged manually.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_PC_room
string.body: Special Place;Refers to PC cafes. It is one of the privileges exclusive to PC cafes and is displayed as a service provided to users who log in from PC cafes.

string.body: Scorched Land Obscura;[%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5_Fortress_D2_ShadowStalker_65_An] and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5_Fortress_D2_ShadowStalkerH_65_An] that inhabit [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5_Fortress_SZ_D2].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF5_Fortress_Statue_Rune_65_An
string.body: Baneful Nagolem;[%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5_Fortress_B1_StatueM_N_65_Ae] and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5_Fortress_B1_StatueF_N_65_Ae] found in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5_Fortress_SZ_B1]. They seem different from ordinary Nagolem.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF5_Fortress_A3_TR_65_An_Q
string.body: Kaldor Remnants;A group of Tiamat remnants who can be found near [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5_Fortress_SZ_A3_Named]. They include [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5_Fortress_A3_TR_Fi_65_An_Q], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5_Fortress_A3_TR_Wi_65_An_Q], and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5_Fortress_A3_TR_As1_65_An_Q].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_24114all
string.body: Umkata's Three Tokens;Refers to [%dic:STR_DIC_I_quest_24114a], [%dic:STR_DIC_I_quest_24114b], and [%dic:STR_DIC_I_quest_24114c].

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF5_Fortress_Vritra_MQ_L_all
string.body: Flamecrest Invaders;[%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5_Fortress_Vritra_L_Q_Fi_65_An] and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5_Fortress_Vritra_L_Q_As_65_An]. It seems they appeared through [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_LDF5_Fortress_FOBJ_Q10101a].

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF5_Fortress_Vritra_MQ_D_all
string.body: Stonereach Survey Invaders;[%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5_Fortress_Vritra_D_Q_Fi_65_An] and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5_Fortress_Vritra_D_Q_AS_65_An]. It seems they appeared through [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_LDF5_Fortress_FOBJ_Q20101a].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_GAb1_Ag_all
string.body: Panesterra Escort;An escort dispatched to the starting position of the Panesterra Fortress Battle. [%dic:STR_DIC_N_GAb1_01_BelosAg_E], [%dic:STR_DIC_N_GAb1_02_AspidaAg_E], [%dic:STR_DIC_N_GAb1_03_AthantosAg_E], and [%dic:STR_DIC_N_GAb1_04_DysilonAg_E] are at different Panesterra fortress entrances.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_item_gab_all_title01
string.body: Panesterra Conqueror;A title obtainable by conquering the fortress in Panesterra Fortress Battle. The title disappears after a period of time and is needed for entering the Ahserion's Flight.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Vritramachine
string.body: Power Generator;Power generators of the Beritra forces are being discovered in Levinshor and other regions.They seem to open portals that can be used to travel to other regions.
